html:
New Delhi

New Delhi, Jan. 10 -- Amazon has filed an appeal in the National Company Law Appellate Tribunal against the order of the Competition Commission of India (CCI) that suspended the over two-year-old approval for its deal with Future Coupons Pvt Ltd, people familiar with the matter said.

In December, CCI suspended the 2019 approval for Amazon's deal to acquire a 49% stake in Future, while slapping a penalty of Rs.202 crore on the e-commerce major.

According to the people cited above, Amazon has moved the NCLAT and filed an appeal against the CCI order that was passed last month. P14 Published by HT Digital Content Services with permission from Hindustan Times.
